SELECT bp.name, CASE WHEN bp.sex = 1 THEN '男' WHEN bp.sex = 0 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,bp.birthday,CURDATE()) as age, hd.dname, bd.disease, ts.name tsName, bpia.quantity, bpia.treatment_quantity, bo.create_time as outpatient_time, bs.create_time as signature_time FROM bu_signature bs LEFT JOIN bu_patient bp ON bs.patient_id = bp.id AND bp.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN hs_department hd ON bs.department_id = hd.id AND hd.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_outpatient bo ON bs.outpatient_id = bo.id AND bo.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_prescription_item_appointment bpia ON bs.prescription_item_id = bpia.prescription_item_id AND bpia.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ts_sytech ts ON bpia.entity_id = ts.id AND ts.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN bu_diagnose bd ON bs.outpatient_id = bd.outpatient_id WHERE bs.is_del = 0 AND bs.treatment_status = 0
and (bp.name like concat('%',#{waitTreatmentRo.search},'%') or bp.phone like concat('%',#{waitTreatmentRo.search},'%'))
and bs.department_id = #{waitTreatmentRo.departmentId}
ORDER BY bs.create_time
